subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Roberto Luongo earned his 401st career win, and Jaromir Jagr got his 1,800th career point as the host Florida Panthers beat Boston, 4-2, hurting the Bruins’ playoff chances.
snippet: Roberto Luongo earned his 401st career win, and Jaromir Jagr got his 1,800th career point as the host Florida Panthers beat Boston, 4-2, hurting the Bruins’ playoff chances.
